item.title: Senate Confirms Rabbi Kaploun as Antisemitism Envoy
item.description: The Senate has confirmed Rabbi Yehuda Kaploun as the Trump administration's special envoy to monitor and combat antisemitism.

item.title: Mitt Romney: Reform the Tax Code
item.description: Former Sen. Mitt Romney, R-Utah, said in a New York Times opinion piece that rich people should pay more taxes through a reformed tax code.
